name: EscapeVR: Trapped Above the Clouds
description: You find yourself trapped above the clouds - in a mile high building which is still partly under construction! Can you escape? Explore the environment, solve puzzles, investigate clues, and find your way through a total of 3 large areas to -hopefully- escape the penthouse of this VR escape room game.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or later, 64bit Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 29 Storage: 6 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or later, 64bit Processor: Intel Core i5-6500 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 480 Storage: 6 GB available space
